alert.note: Alert for Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central New London County through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over mainly rural areas of Northeastern New London County, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Ledyard, Griswold, Preston, Voluntown, Ledyard Center, Montville and North Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
